mapper.insert: insert into t_user_channel (company_id, company_name, channel_no, description, create_date, last_update_time, status) values (#{companyId},#{companyName},#{channelNo},#{description},now(),now(),1)
mapper.select: select id, company_id, company_name, channel_no, description, create_date, last_update_time, status from t_user_channel where id=#{id}

select count(1) from t_user_channel where 1=1
and company_id like '%${companyId}%'
and channel_no like '%${channelNo}%'
